text:
With the exception of adding linked files
e.g.
```{{ module_asset_url("background.png") }}```
works in module.css
How can I get full user name from comment on blog ?

Mark and Matt are correct, some additional context on the why:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#css-module-css->
It would be super nice if you could load theme variables and macro’s into the css file which also don’t rely on any module variables
Yea, I was hoping to use it for theme variables
Next best thing would be to create css variables from theme variables and then use your css variables in the module.css
HubL Vars into CSS vars is really the way to go, IMO.
